Product Overview

4Dots POS All in One Solution

Transform your business operations with our comprehensive 4Dots POS system.

Contact us
Product Overview

Our 4Dots POS system provides a complete solution for managing your business. With a powerful Dashboard, streamline Point-of-Sale transactions, and efficiently manage Customer and Supplier relationships. Oversee Products Management, Purchases Tracking, and Sales Management. Facilitate Stock Transfers and Adjustments, track Expenses, and manage Payment Accounts. Leverage Reporting and Analytics for insights, stay updated with Notifications, customize your operations through System Settings, and enhance efficiency with the Production Module and HR Management.

Major Modules
  • Dashboard
  • Point-of-sale
  • Customer / Supplier Management
  • Products Management
  • Purchases Tracking
  • Sales Management
  • Stock Transfers and Adjustments
  • Expenses Tracking
  • Payment Accounts
  • Reporting and Analytics
  • Notifications
  • System Settings
  • Production Module
  • HR Management
Dashboard

Access key performance metrics and manage your operations effortlessly.

Point-of-sale

Streamline your sales transactions with an intuitive POS interface.

Supplier Management

Manage your customer & supplier info in one place.

Products Management

Efficiently handle your product listings and inventory levels.
